Conviction locks do overlap and is addit: 锁定确实会重叠并且是相加的，这意味着在上一次投票中锁定的资金可以再次被锁。
If this proposal is passed, the changes: 如果该提案获得通过，则更改将通过执行应用，并退还保证金。
Only applicable if the proposal has alre: 仅在提案已经通过并准备发送时才适用
Register the vote for or against the pro: 登记赞成或反对提案的投票
Seconding a proposal that indicates your: 附议一份表明您对该提案的支持的提案。 兴趣更大的提案将排队等待下一次全民公投。
Select the account you wish to make the: 选择您要用来提出提案的帐户。
Select the account you wish to second wi: 选择您想用来申请附议的帐户。 这将锁定您的资金，直到提案被批准或拒绝为止
The account you want to register the pre: 您要从中注册原像的帐户
The account you want to register the pro: 您要从中注册提案的帐户
The amount reserved to store this image: 保留用于存储该图像的数量
The amount this total can be reduced by: The amount this total can be reduced by to change the referendum outcome. This assumes changes to the convictions of the existing votes, with no additional turnout.
The amount this total should be increase: The amount this total should be increased by to change the referendum outcome. This assumes additional turnout with new votes at 1x conviction.
The associated deposit for this proposal: The associated deposit for this proposal should be more then the minimum on-chain deposit required. It will be locked until the proposal passes.
The balance associated with the vote wil: The balance associated with the vote will be locked as per the conviction specified and will not be available for transfer during this period.
The calculated storage costs based on th: 根据大小和每字节的费用计算出的存储成本。
The conviction to use for this vote, wit: 此投票的公信力，带有适当的锁定期。
The external proposal to send to the tec: 外部提案发送给技术委员会
The hash of the preimage for the proposa: 提案原像的哈希值，先前提交的或打算使用的
The hash of the selected proposal, use i: 所选提案的哈希，用于提交提案
The image (proposal) will be stored on-c: 图片（提案）将根据内容的哈希值存储在链上
The proposal is in the queue for future: 该提案正在等待将来的全民公投。 此列表中的一项提案将继续进行投票
The proposal will be registered from thi: 提案将从该帐户中注册，余额锁定将在此处应用
The vote will be recorded for this accou: 该帐户的投票将记录下来。 如果将另一个帐户委派给该帐户，则也将计算委派的票数。
The voting period to apply in blocks: 以区块为单位的投票期限
This account will pay the fees for the p: 该帐户将根据原像的大小支付费用。
When submitting a proposal the hash need: 提交提案时，需要知道哈希值。 提案可以仅使用哈希进行提交，但是在分发时，需要提供原像
imminent preimage (proposal already pass: 即将到来的原像（提案已通过）
{{value}}x voting balance, locked for {{: {{value}}x 投票余额, 锁定 {{lock}}x 设定为 ({{period}} 天)
